name: Über Bää
description:
As the queen bee of your hive you must control your swarm of bees to attack the hordes of incoming enemies in order to protect yourself and get out of harm's way.

A shoot 'em up game. Control the queen bee of the hive, who manipulates the other bees, to defend yourself againts coming enemies. Gain as much points as you can by defeating your opponents.

Download the .zip file, extract the contents, open the extracted folder, and press the .exe  to start the game.


Über Bää is a game developed by a group of 1st year students at Uppsala University.
Elena Hurtado Vázquez - Graphic Designer, 2D Graphics
Petrea Kaðlín Sigmundsdóttir - Graphic Designer, 2D Graphics
Edvin Eriksson - Programmer
Teemu Laiho - Programmer
Dong Liu - Project Owner
Ludvig Köhn - Game Designer, Testing

Leo Wognum - Music
